data.name: Global Microsoft 365 Developer Bootcamp 2020 - Trivandrum, Kerala
data.description: We are excited to kick off the Global Microsoft 365 Developer Bootcamp. This year’s bootcamps will incorporate the technologies and products that are now included in the Microsoft 365 platform.
